name: This is the name of my story
author: anthrax_fish

1.name: You start at an empty house

resources.content: You are in an empty house. Surrounding you are for blank walls. To the north there is a door

links.prompt: Open the door and go outside
Stay in the house and wait

resources.content: You are in the woods. To your east you see a mailbox. To your south you see a door that leads to a small house.
You wait for 1 day. Nothing happens.

links.prompt: Open the door and go outside

resources.content: You open the mailbox. You notice one letter with a golden envelope carefully sealed with a red wax stamp. The seal has a crest on it.
You open the letter. Inside you find a silver coin, roughly 2 inches in size.
You brusquely rip up the letter in half. A silver coin approximately 2 inches in size falls out and lands on the ground.
It's a coin with a picture on it. It looks like the most beautiful thing you have ever seen.
